DOC.detailed_description: For calendar year 1993-94 , 1999 , 2005 , 2010 , 2015 identify every hospitalize autopsied stroke transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) regional hospital region . We also estimate number non-hospitalized stroke TIAs screen potential case 100 outpatient site throughout five county Greater Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky . We plan identify abstract detail information medical record every potential case . These result compare data stroke patient identify similar methodology study period . In addition , interviewed 1500 ischemic stroke patient and/or family study period 1999-2010 obtain detailed information include demographic information , functional outcome quality life , access type rehabilitation therapy , social support , caregiver availability health status , access post-hospital care , health insurance status , current health status , medication , prior risk factor , knowledge stroke sign symptom . We also obtain genetic material via blood sample cohort .
